name: Left or Right? The Zigzag Line
name_original: Left or Right? The Zigzag Line
description:
You are a stick moving in a zigzag line. Use the walls and the holes of the board to go far in this pinball style game!

Tap left or right for each movement and you'll find different items in your way. Items can make the game easier for your...or more complicated...it's the reason why decisions are so important in this game!
